feed.title: glazeruns TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

entry.title: If you see a giant @PRIME bottle running through the LA marathon this weekend. Say hi. I'll be easy to spot. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #marathon #ultrarunner #runtok
entry.content: If you see a giant @PRIME bottle running through the LA marathon this weekend. Say hi. I'll be easy to spot. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #marathon #ultrarunner #runtok

entry.title: It's just 26 miles though. Los Angeles Marathon see you soon. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #marathon #ultrarunner

entry.title: Time to get loopy in Joshua Tree. 12 hours should be a nice warmup for the LA Marathon tomorrow. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultrarunner #runstreak

entry.title: It's always great to set a World Record. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. . #runtok #lamarathon

entry.title: Fun time in the Prime suit . #runtok #lamarathon

entry.title: Warmup race for the LA Marathon the next day. Ran 12 hours around Joshua Tree, drove home, ate half a pizza, slept 2 hours, drove to Los Angeles, and ran the LA Marathon in the Prime suit. The perfect weekend. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. . #runtok #u
entry.content: Warmup race for the LA Marathon the next day. Ran 12 hours around Joshua Tree, drove home, ate half a pizza, slept 2 hours, drove to Los Angeles, and ran the LA Marathon in the Prime suit. The perfect weekend. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. . #runtok #u

entry.title: Happy Medal Monday Los Angeles Marathon ✅️ #runtok #lamarathon
entry.content: Happy Medal Monday Los Angeles Marathon ✅️ #runtok #lamarathon

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
